stories.text:
Hello, golang users!

gup command updates all binaries installed with "go install". Binary updates are easier. https://github.com/nao1215/gup

gup uses goroutine for updates, it is faster than similar tools. I have completed the implementation of the required features. So I would like to hear from you all.
stories.title: Gup – Update binaries installed by “go install”

stories.text:
Do you practice writing code consistently?

(Especially outside of your day-job?)

How often (daily?), and when in your day?

How do you decide what code to write?

Any sites or resources you've found useful in this area?

Disclaimer: I work on https://codecrafters.io and I'm exploring how best to support our learners
stories.title: Ask HN: Do you write code just for practice?
